name: Spells, Scrolls, and Student Debt
description:
Combine spells. Avoid paperwork golems. Try to make as much money as you can.

You only need to use your mouse to play this game.

A game made in 2 months as a self-challenge by DistractedMOSFET (@DisMOSFET on twitter). 

Note: It seems if you have strict anti-tracking settings in your browser it can prevent the game from remembering previous scores, or that you've completed the tutorial. But if you want to keep your anti-tracking on the game should play just fine.
